About Me

Hi! I am an engineering student in Computer Science at Ponts Paristech and currently enrolled at a Master program(MVA) in Computer Vision and Machine Learning at ENS Paris Saclay.

Research Interest

I am broadly interested in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Signal/Image Processing, Mapping systems and Statistics.

Experience
